name: Fillo - Crystal Version
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Pocket. A game by: László Rajcsányi -  Wilds, 2022. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0-beta5 by Chris Maltby!

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console! 

Fillo is an emperor penguin who spends most of his time in Antarctica. Now he had a little trouble because his territory was occupied by the invaders. Help Fillo designate an area where he can spend his time with his love. In a mission through 15 levels, you must collect all the ice diamonds and trick the enemy penguins that take back the area you have already occupied. Time is also your enemy, you have a total of 20 seconds on each level to finish it. Good luck!

The game was inspired by the graphics of plenty of other games. These are all Commodore16 games like: Major Blink, Petch, Boulder Dash, Harvey Headbanger. The music is transcripts of similar melodic songs by Rob Hubbard.

Thanks to Chris Maltby for this awesome program (GB-Studio) that makes it easy to make a Gameboy game.

Start the game: Start
Move: Cursor Keys
Push: A
Pause: Start or Select

Start the game: Enter
Move: Arrow Keys
Push: Z
Pause: Enter or Shift
